Safety concerns: The gadget may have sharp edges or hot surfaces that could cause accidents if not handled properly, posing a risk to the user.
Compatibility issues: The gadget may not work well with other kitchen appliances or cookware, leading to inefficiencies and inconvenience.
High maintenance: The gadget may require frequent cleaning or replacement of parts, which can be time-consuming and costly.
Lack of versatility: The gadget may only perform a single function, limiting its usefulness and value.
Overhyped claims: The gadget may promise unrealistic results or features, leading to disappointment and mistrust among users.
